"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/552d8e8e63687206601a0000#post_552d8e8e63687206601a0000
Ame still. Although if I had one criticism of the movie it's that both yuki and ame [spoiler]seem to loose appreciation for the fact that they can be both wolf and human and just stick to one forever. As someone who would love to be able to do that, that bugs the crap out of me. It's like someone not eating the crust of their pizza. Like, exceptionally good pizza crust. It drives me nuts a little.  Maybe it's just a personal nitpick[/spoiler]
